evidence.claim: ADN Digital utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company supports FHIR for interoperability in health tech solutions.
ADN Digital implements HIPAA-compliant processes for data security.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming.
Integration middleware services are provided to connect EHRs with other health data systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of use cases related to X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities found.
